predicate.note: Frames file for 'qualify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 29.2, 29.6, other framed members include bill, classify, count, define, describe, emply, establish, intend, portray, rank, recommend, regard, treat, view; act. That's one sense. No framenet entry.

example.name: all args
example.text: John qualified his statements as "just kidding, sheesh!"

roleset.name: measure up to

example.name: arg2-for
example.text: Paribas said it will bid 1,850 francs a share for Navigation Mixte shares that *trace* qualify for a full yearly dividend...

example.name: arg2-as
example.text: He said the decision was the first in which a federal appeals court has ruled whether administrative government proceedings qualify as litigation.

roleset.note: The latter case could be paraphrased as "...proceedings qualify for use as litigation" or something like that. Or maybe it's the other roleset.
